name: BeaconClientDApp
summary: Beacon is an implementation of the wallet interaction standard tzip-10 which describes the connection of a dApp with a wallet. BeaconClientDApp provides the Beacon implementation for dApps.
description: Beacon is an implementation of the Tezos wallet interaction standard tzip-10 which describes the connection of a dApp with a wallet. BeaconClientDApp provides the Beacon implementation for dApps.
